surface_layer.definition: G-protein coupled receptors (GPCRs) are a large family of cell surface receptors that activate intracellular signaling pathways.

deep_layer.mechanism: GPCRs bind to extracellular ligands and activate G proteins, which then modulate downstream effector proteins.
deep_layer.origin: Important for signal transduction in diverse cellular processes.

epistemic_metadata.source: Steroid Hormone Receptors and Signal Transduction Processes
